description:
Stiffer than Arcade’s standard belts, the Hardwear belt will keep all of your heavy workpants in line. The stiffer stretch webbing is paired with a burly buckle that has been designed for improved strength and retention. The infinite adjustability that Arcade is known for is still there, because a tough belt still needs to be comfy.

  • Stretch webbing is tough and abrasion resistant
  • Tapered buckle slips easily through stiff belt loops
  • Buckle allows for precise adjustment, is easy to open and close, and won’t pinch while you play
  • Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport
  • One-size design fits up to 40in. waists
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Hardware Belt - Unisex
